item.title: Wells Fargo sees another big stock market gain in 2025 on strong economy, deregulation under Trump
item.description: The Wall Street firm expects the S&P 500 will advance more than 11% to 6,600 by the end of 2025.

item.title: Nvidia to report third-quarter earnings after the bell
item.description: In August, Nvidia said it expected about "several billion" in Blackwell sales during the January quarter.

item.title: Pivotal Research hikes Netflix price target to Street-high $1,100 after Tyson-Paul fight
item.description: The record-breaking numbers for the match between Mike Tyson and Jake Paul show Netflix's preeminence in the streaming sector, per Pivotal Research.

item.title: Delta CEO says Trump administration's approach to regulation could be 'breath of fresh air'
item.description: Delta CEO Ed Bastian said the Trump administration could address governmental "overreach" in regulation.

item.title: Piper Sandler says this tech stock that is up 700% in 2024 has more room to run
item.description: The firm initiated coverage with an overweight rating and $400 price target on shares, implying shares could climb an additional 24.5% from Tuesday's ...
